mng: hero, heroic, outstanding person, prominent, distinguished

exm.mng: illustrious hero, spirit of the place (idiom); a place derives reflected glory from an illustrious son
Li Lianjie or Jet Li (1963-), martial arts sportsman, subsequently film star and director

Di Renjie (607-700), Tang dynasty politician, prime minister under Wu Zetian, subsequently hero of legends, master sleuth Judge Dee, aka Chinese Sherlock Holmes, in novel Three murder cases solved by Judge Dee 狄公案[Di2 gong1 an4] translated by Dutch sinologist R.H. van Gulik 高羅珮|高罗佩[Gao1 Luo2 pei4]
Jackson (name), Jackson city, capital of Mississippi
